channel.title: Rust on Amateur Hour
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on Amateur Hour

item.title: A small shell in rust
item.description: NOTE: You can see the source code for the shell on GitHub. After turning in my first Operating Systems homework, I remembered why people invented high-level languages. C’s beautiful and powerful and really bare-metal, but it’s also insanely easy to shoot yourself with it. And because I haven’t programmed in C for 2 or 3 years, I probably made every stupid mistake imaginable. Accidentally returned a pointer to something allocated on the stack?
